entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
